title: An ‘apocalypse’ for Southern Baptists: Investigation reveals years of sexual abuse cover ups
description: A bombshell investigation of sexual abuse in the Southern Baptist Convention has revealed that SBC leaders kept a secret list of more than 700 abuse cases,  stonewalled investigations, and covered up allegations of sexual abuse and sexual violence. Russell Moore, public theologian for “Christianity Today,” joins Chuck to discuss the fallout.
